name: KanaRun - ENG
description:
KanaRun - ENG

This is a little Game for learning Japanese Kana ... for now Hiragana.

now in ENGLISH

the GERMAN version is now HERE

Playable in Browser or as Gameboy Rom for your Emulator.

--------

Controls:

TL:DR:    --    Z  , X  , Enter , Shift ,  Arrow Keys

or ... 

Up - Up Arrow / W

Down - Down Arrow / S

Left - Left Arrow / A

Right - Right Arrow / D

A - Alt / Z / J

B - Ctrl / K / X

Start - Enter

Select - Shift

------------------

Note: - there is no sound / music 

BETA 02 - Made with GB Studio 2 Beta - 202201 EP
